snippet: Video and images of the devastation from the Quebec town where an oil-laden train crashed and exploded, leaving 20 people confirmed dead and 30 others missing and presumed dead.
abstract: Video and images of the devastation from the Quebec town where an oil-laden train crashed and exploded, leaving 20 people confirmed dead and 30 others missing and presumed dead.

headline.main: Video of Railway Head Blaming Fiery Crash in Quebec on Train Employee
